SEARCH
Package org.example.menu

Class PharmacistMenu

java.lang.Object
org.example.menu.PharmacistMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Menu
public class PharmacistMenu extends Object implements Menu
Pharmacist menu

Pharmacist can view appointment outcome record, update prescription status, view medication inventory, submit replenishment request

Show persistence warning when stock level is low

Menu keeps a pharmacist session id to keep track of user's state The following dependencies are injected:

- StaffRepository - Pharmacist login - Medicine repository - View medication inventory, submit replenishment request - AppointmentOutcomeRecordRepository - View appointment outcome record, update prescription status - MedicineRequestRepository - Submit replenishment request - MedicationRepository - Update prescription status
